entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as feeling drowsy after eating.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, who gets up to give start-of-term notices. He is mentioned as being able to command the attention of all students.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as exchanging smirks with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts. She is mentioned as exchanging smirks with Ron and Harry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore addresses the students, commanding their attention.
Harry exchanges smirks with Ron and Hermione.
Dumbledore mentions the forest as being out of bounds to students.
Harry's bed is waiting for him, described as warm and soft.
